MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK10 area of Alloa. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of repairs required to our underground electricity network near the Drysdale Street substation and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:48pm on Tuesday, 22 December 2020
